governance, economic policy, and social dynamics.

Established in 1954 by Prince Bernhard of the Netherlands (https://

www.bilderbergmeetings.org/about/), the group has been criticized for its lack

of transparency and accountability. Despite its claims to promote dialogue and

understanding among European leaders, critics argue that the Bilderberg

Group serves as a platform for shaping global policies in favor of corporate

interests and elite power structures.
